text: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ
translation: (8) We do not send down the angels except with truth;[671] and they [i.e., the disbelievers] would not then be reprieved.
footnotes: [671]- i.e., with a message or, as the conclusion of the verse suggests, to carry out a promised punishment.
